Reviews.Title: “Wonderful for a one-night stay”
Reviews.Author: Greekprof7
Reviews.Content: Even though the hotel is right off I-465 and there is much road noise outside, inside we never knew we were that close to the highway. The decor in the lobby and breakfast area is very modernistic and interesting. The room in which we stayed was spacious and clean...for the most part. There was some interesting trash behind the couch for which the front desk clerk apologized.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location!”
Reviews.Author: travel11
Reviews.Content: Wow, I cannot say enough about this hotel to do it justice. The location is very convenient to all things Indy related (which is why we found this hotel to begin with). We had an event downtown and relatives in a Northern suburb of Indy and this location was perfect for both! When pulling into the parking lot we felt we were sure to experience a nice Holiday Inn Express, but when entering the lobby we were surprised by the super modern decor and feel as well as the overall genuine, warm greeting we received from the front desk attendant. Great size rooms ... we had 2 king size beds!! Really, not kidding! The breakfast is fantastic, staff friendly, we will surely be back soon. Thanks to all who made our stay incredible!

Reviews.Title: “A great time for all”
Reviews.Author: CoachRatz
Reviews.Content: We have used this hotel the last 3 times in Indianapolis, for my basketball team, when we are in the area for Lutheran School Tournaments. The staff has always been very helpful, and have always made everyone in our group feel very welcomed and comfortable. The rooms had two King beds, and large TVs. My last room was a Suite with a fireplace (I was the envy of everyone with our team). With booking a large number of rooms, the Manager kept a very open line of communication to make sure everyone's needs were met. The complimentary breakfast bar consisted of the standard cereals, pastries, scrambled eggs, sausage and make-yourself-waffles amongst other things. The woman working the area was very nice and keep the food stocked. As long as my basketball team is attending tournaments in the Indianapolis area, The Holiday Inn Express-Southeast, Indianapolis will be our first choice of hotel to stay at. Every time we get ready for a tournament in the area, all of the players and parents ask if we can stay at the Holiday Inn Express.

Reviews.Title: “A great value close to downtown”
Reviews.Author: DonZ67
Reviews.Content: Close to Indiana Bible College, this recently remodeled (within past 3 years according to manager) hotel is close to I-465 & I-65 and just minutes from down town. The rooms are comfy, clean, and nicely decorated. Staff is great - very friendly and accomodating.

Reviews.Title: “Terrific hotel! Shhh....well-kept secret!”
Reviews.Author: harryk2000
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Holiday Day Inn Express Southeast Indy for 5 nights. My wife had a training seminar being conducted on-site so it made sense to stay at the same place. The hotel appears brand new and has a modern-flair to it with upbeat sounds of today being piped through the P.A. system and avante-garde decor. Probably something you might expect in trendier locales like downtown Boston, Manhattan or Philly rather than in the Midwest. The room we stayed in had 2 king beds (wow!), wet bar, mini refrigerator, microwave, sofa, large-screen LCD TV and free wifi. I believe these are standard features for all their rooms. An indoor swimming pool and mini-arcade kept our 3-year old son entertained. The complimentary breakfast bar consisted of the standard accoutrements of cereal, pastries, scrambled eggs, sausage and make-yourself-waffles amongst other things. Staff in the dining area and front desk was very friendly and attentive. Location-wise, it's right off the outer beltway of Indy in the southeast quadrant. There are several fast food options within walking distance along with a Japanese steak house. Access is easy to this hotel and downtown Indy is only 20 minutes away. We were pleasantly surprised with this hotel and plan to return there instead of staying at our usual hotel in the northwest area when visiting Indy. It seems as though this hotel is a well-kept secret and so shhhhh! :)

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful weekend stay!”
Reviews.Author: Sue C
Reviews.Content: We were so pleased with this Holiday Inn Express over the weekend. The hotel was very clean, the room was very large and the staff were excellent. Angela at Check-in was very helpful and kind. Brettney at Check-out was very nice to us and Lee who was hostess at breakfast was efficient and very happy to help out in any way. Overall, we were thrilled with the service, the rooms and pool & breakfast area!! We will definately make that our Indianapolis primary hotel stay when we visit family!!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding and when it really counts!!”
Reviews.Author: dayokal
Reviews.Content: Had to go up there to Indy on an emergency issue and I tell you what, this property was just great. They got me right into a room that was clean and ready. The staff was quick and very well mannered and courtiious. The property was very well maintained. I will be back for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel”
Reviews.Author: traveler711_11
Reviews.Content: Great service, attentive staff and the most elegant HI Express I have ever stayed in. The lobby was very beautifully decorated, the room was beautiful, clean and the heating unit worked perfectly. Will definitely stay here again if I am in the area. 2 king beds! So clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Fine for a trip”
Reviews.Author: jrhusc
Reviews.Content: We stayed here en route to Iowa. I thought it was brand new, it was very clean and neat. There were 2 king beds in our room. Only problem was it seemed the floors were thin-I could hear someone, I assume above us, walking (stomping?) around for an hour about 11pm. It did stop later, but it was disturbing. Maybe the person above was huge, but it was quite loud I don't see anyone else has commented on this. It was right beside the interstate, but traffic noise was not an issue. It was really convenient. There is a Starbucks nearby, and they were great. I'd written my wife's coffee order down on a pad from the room with the HI logo and they realized I was from out of town and gave me a couple food items free. I'd made a reservation after 9pm while coming from Ohio into Indiana; I think the girl on the phone was India, because I asked her what part of Indianapolis it was in. She could not understand what I was asking because....she made the reservation at an Ohio HI-a hundred miles behind us. Minutes later after I put it into the GPS and saw where it was I called the Ohio location and thankfully the nice lady there did not charge us and fixed it. She seemed to know the call center people have done this before. I was not from there so I had no idea what they had done. HI, if you're going to outsource your calls, make your people know the geography of the USA. I am a platinum Priority Club member. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “great trip!!”
Reviews.Author: magicvic
Reviews.Content: From the time we arrived on Nov 9th,2011 til our departure on Nov 12, we experienced nothing but top flight service from Kevn and his staff! Our room was cleaned everyday, the breakfast bar was super, and the people couldnt have been nicer! The room was well appointed with 2 super king size beds, hdtv, a fridge, and was very comfortable. We always have great experiences at Holiday Inn and will be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous!”
Reviews.Author: L F
Reviews.Content: This HIE was awesome. Extremely clean, 2 king size beds, nicely decorated, great staff, great breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible customer service”
Reviews.Author: benderk
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel on business and they charged me $250 for smoking in my room. I have never smoked in my life and they refuse to remove the charge. The management gave me the worst customer service I have ever received in my life. The hotel accommodations were fine, but I will never stay at a holiday inn express based on the customer service, or lack thereof that I received.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible says it all”
Reviews.Author: kysoccergirls
Reviews.Content: We also stayed here as part of a team group. It seems like inconsistency and bizzare policy is what they are all about! We stayed Friday night and played cards, watch the world series game, etc. Kevin even came in and watched some of the game with us. We were there until at least midnight. The next night, we were kicked out promptly at 10pm and told we had to go to our rooms because the lobby and great room were closed (hotel policy). Ms. Nelson was horribly rude. She said she had received several complaints, yet never told us or asked us to be more quiet. I called corporate and was told that that is NOT the policy at all HI express. When I asked the following morning for a copy of their policy, the clerk called Kevin and was told it is not written anywhere; he would be in Monday morning if I wanted to call back. When I called Monday, I was told he was not there???? I could go on and on, but I've wasted enough time and money on these idiots! Short version: TV was blurry, toilets did not flush,beds very hard, staff unreasonable and flat out lies. When 1/3 of your reviews are TERRIBLE, I think that says it all.

Reviews.Title: “Helpful and excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Doug S
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in numerous Holiday Inn Expresses and have always been pleased but the service at this hotel was so good that I feel compelled to tell others. I will be staying at this hotel during next years convention.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience!”
Reviews.Author: D H
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this hotel 3 to 4 times now over the last 2 years and have had only good experiences here. The staff is friendly and sociable, the breakfast very good with a nice variety of items, the rooms large and the king-sized beds extremely comfortable. Even the cleaning people are friendly and helpful! The workout room is nice. Conveniently located near Wal-mart and lots of restaurants. I thoroughly enjoy staying at this hotel and will continue to do so as long as my travels take me to Indianapolis!

Reviews.Title: “Stay here”
Reviews.Author: Greg t
Reviews.Content: I have stayed a many holiday inn expresses and this one is excellent. The Room size is large with 2 king size beds in every room. The rate is well priced. The internet speed is fast. The TV's are 40+ inch flat screens. The staff was friendly and prompt. This holiday inn is way better than the one 4 miles to the west and cheaper. This holiday inn also has a cool feel to the breakfast area with a high ceiling making the area feel really open.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Experience”
Reviews.Author: thepupis04
Reviews.Content: We are platinum members in the priority club program and have stayed at many hotels within this chain of hotels. This by far has been our best experience. I have EXTREMELY high standards when it comes to hotels, comfort, cleanliness, customer service and room size. This hotel has superceeded all our expectations. Our room had 2 King Size beds, Yes 2. They were so comfortable. The location was awesome, right in the vicinty of so many restaurants, places to eat, walmart and starbucks across the street. Everyone was just so nice and made us feel so comfortable, even with. The pool and gym are great. It was so clean and you could even smell how clean it was. Management and staff go out of their way to welcome you and offer great customer service. We could not say one bad thing about it, everything was exceptional. I can't wait to come back. Thank you Holiday Inn Express Indianapolis Southeast for such an amazing 4 days.

Reviews.Title: “Matt B”
Reviews.Author: matt b
Reviews.Content: Excellent staff, clean spacious room, hot breakfast, my kind of place. A enjoyable experience.

Reviews.Title: “Extraordinary”
Reviews.Author: MrsPhelps5110
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to this hotel, or any Holiday Inn Express, for that matter. We will be going back! We had the jacuzzi suite and were very satisfied with everything! We are used to a contintental, cold breakfast bar. Boy, we were blown away! Pancakes, biscuits and gravy, toast, eggs, and more! LOVED THE STAY!

Reviews.Title: “Quite, Comfortable, and Restful Stay”
Reviews.Author: Eric H
Reviews.Content: Even though the Hotel is located near the Interstate, I couldn't hear any of the traffic. Room was clean, bed was comfortable, and the staff were pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Better than average, would go again”
Reviews.Author: SgtHartmann
Reviews.Content: #1 Room keys- make sure you keep your magnetic card room keys well away from your cell phone. #2 Business Center - glad they have it but it is now a standard feature for a hotel we select. Wow, a 28.8 modem? At least that was the speed it felt like. I'm not an IT technician but the computer was effectively unusable due to the surf speed. Something that needs attention. #3 Salty pool? - we heavily use our YMCA at home through out the year but I've never surfaced when swimming to note a salty taste to the water (no, I'm not drinking the pool water but some exposure is unavoidable). I know nothing of pool chemistry despite being in them year round but I have never experienced that effect before. Pool area was clean and it was neat that the pool had a waterfall. #4 Breakfast - breakfast area was clean and well attended. VERY good hot breakfast bar selection. We got there toward the end of service (9:30am) and everything was still fully stocked. Was a bit odd having the lights turned off after the staff cleared away the breakfast items. We were not the only still-seated guests to react this way. Afterward, I mentioned this to the front desk and I got the explaination they do that when the sun is up high / bright enough (Sorry, turning the lights off in this situation is not a go-green initiative, it is a signal. It makes the statement get-a-move-on buster). It wouldn't have made it to this review if the staff simply said oops and said it wouldn't happen to other guests going forward. #5 Rooms - surprised to find 2 king sized beds in the room, wow. Despite their large foot print, the room didn't feel crowded. Well appointed room, nothing wanting. #6 Shower - it drains! My biggest pet peeve with any hotel is a shower that won't drain. Good pressure, clean shower curtain. #7 Mold smell - absolutely none, my second biggest issue for a hotel. #8 Road noise - despite being directly adjacent to a highway, there was no noticible road noise - hooray for the engineer and architect! #9 Location - didn't have to worry about security of the location - no problem. #10 overall value - we'd choose to this hotel again when we go back to Indy next..

Reviews.Title: “Nice but have them check your room before you leave!!!”
Reviews.Author: lindgren3
Reviews.Content: After traveling most weekends in the summer with baseball & basketball teams we were impressed with the updates at this hotel....that was until we received our credit card bill. Without a letter or phone call to inform us, this hotel charged us $75 for a burnt hole in a brown blanket . We did not use a brown blanket during this stay and we are NOT smokers. After 3 calls back to this hotel they are not budging. We play in many tournaments in this area & we will not stay here again - Very disappointing...looks like a trend...TRAVELERS BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: “We were Satisfied with our choice”
Reviews.Author: MOJO329
Reviews.Content: Came to Indianapolis on our summer vacation & seeing that this was our first time in the city, wanted something that was located in a good location. This hotel was an easy commute into downtown Indianapolis. As well, it has some good food choices near by as well as a Super Walmart for any of your needs. Another reason, we chose this hotel was the advertisement of being the only hotel that offered double king sized beds, we were curious. We had a double king sized room suite with a king sized pull out sofa bed. Perhaps because the beds were kings, the room could have had a bit more space for our family; but overall the size of the room was unimportant to us as we were interested in having a room that met our family's needs and that it was clean and this room did that even though for a newer hotel, the walls of the room were marked up badly. Breakfast was the usual HI Express breakfast, it was hot and and met our family's appetites perfectly. Overall, we were satisfied with our choice of hotel during our stay in Indianapolis.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel & Front Desk are great! We will be back!”
Reviews.Author: BarnettBarb
Reviews.Content: Great Hotel! We arrived late from a long hour drive with two young-teen boys. The front desk girls was extremely helpful and kind. I believe their names was Nat and another young lady - they always had a smile and was very friendly (they were there all weekend long). We were impressed with the breakfast every morning - something hot and fresh! The boys loved the pool. The room was clean and very spacious! The king size beds were very very comfortable! The only complaint I would have is that we didn't spend enough time at the hotel. :) We are looking forward to returning next year.

Reviews.Title: “Do yourself a favor and stay anyplace but here!”
Reviews.Author: newherebuthere_11
Reviews.Content: We prepaid so even after reading several bad reviews, we had no choice but to stay here. We were on a little Spring Break outing. We stayed two nights. Unfortunately only one our beds got made for the second night. The maid refused to make a bed with our daughter's bag on it. So if you want your beds freshly made, make sure there is NOTHING left on them. Breakfast was okay-mainly prepackaged foods except eggs. The best part of the stay was the surprise charge when I received my credit card bill. The Executive Maid claimed we broke the ironing board so we were charged $25 to repair or replace it. I NEVER iron and neither do my kids or husband. We didn't even have it out. I guess I should be thankful we weren't charged to replace the toilet since it wouldn't flush during our stay. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND this hotel to my worst enemy.

Reviews.Title: “unwilling to help despite medical issue”
Reviews.Author: cardinalgirl37
Reviews.Content: Our daughter is a volleyball player. Our team parent had contacted the hotel to block about 7-9 rooms in which we were given a discount of about $9 per night. The rooms were actually booked by each individual parent, however, when our daughter broke her foot leaving her unable to attend and I called to discuss the cancellation policy I was told that since we booked as a group they couldnt' do "anything about it". I stated that on the same day I was speaking with them I was able to book a room for the same dates and cancel them the following day without any cost. They again cited the "group policy". I asked if we could pay the additional $9 whole dollars per night if we could at least change the dates to a later time when would be able to travel after her break healed and were again told "no". I offered a statement from the physician and any medical documentation they might want and was told it wouldn't make any difference. They did offer to list it as a "no show" if we didn't show up for the first night and I told them of course we were not going to "show up" since her foot was broken and they were "gracious" enough to charge us for the first night. That no show thing would be offered to anyone, whether they had a valid reason or not. If someone can't use common sense and better business judgement than that, we don't need to use their facilities ever again. I will pass this on to our volleyball club which has teams that travel quite frequently and have locations in both Indiana and Kentucky. Hopefully, once each parent representatvie is notified of their response or lack thereof to one of our teams after a player has been injured past the point of playing, none of them will even call for pricing after this.

Reviews.Title: “DON'T STAY HERE!!!”
Reviews.Author: longtravelindy
Reviews.Content: Managment is rude and unhelpful!! Breakfast is a joke! Decor package very cold and uninviting. Can't think of anything good to say. Pool was dirty, carpet in breakfast area dirty, tables dirty. With everything I could see being dirty, made me wonder how clean the towels and sheets were. I WILL NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel with pool and breakfast - great for families”
Reviews.Author: beckirb
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to Indy. Great location to visit zoo, children's museum, speedway, downtown. We required a pool for the kids to swim in plus a hot breakfast (my husband is celiac...so eggs are an easy option for him). We were very pleased with our selection. Great value at ~$100/night. Hotel opened in April 2008. It's clean. Good breakfast (kids loved the cinnamon rolls!). Easy to find...just off I-465. Great location (2 miles south has lots of restaurants to choose from). Very quiet. Loved the 2 king beds and big screen TV. Rooms are spacious. Nice to have both fridge and microwave. Only disappointment was that they advertised a manager's cocktail hour Mon-Thurs...apparently it's been cancelled in the last 6-8 months...but the signs and the book in the room still advertise it! OOPS! No newspapers at our room door, either (this was advertised too). All in all,though, a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “What a great night!”
Reviews.Author: lrkey5158
Reviews.Content: The room was very roomy and clean. The bed was comfortable. The amenities in the room were better than expected.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT HOTEL, IMPRESSIVE HOSPITALITY”
Reviews.Author: atj109
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very clean, comfortable and modern. The staff went above and beyond. Infact, my family was traveling over the holidays and my daughter came down with the flu. She got sick one night at 3:00 AM. My partner went to the front desk to ask for a new set of sheets. Not only did they bring the sheets up to the room and help change the bed, Nancy (the woman at the front desk) even bought a 7-up out of the vending machine and offered their own personal crackers for our daughter to help calm her stomache. Also, the housekeeping the next day had heard that our daughter was sick and made an extra trip to make sure that everything was okay, and to see if she could get us anything. Later, the woman who ran the breakfast offered a tray to bring to the room and offered crackers as well. Not only did the staff here go above and beyond, they actually made us feel as though we were among individuals who were genuinly concerned about our daughter and made it as comfortable as it could have been away from home. Next time I am in Indianapolis, I will definately stay here. By far the best hotel experience that me or my partner have ever had.

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL HOTEL I WANT TO GO BACK”
Reviews.Author: nlkathome
Reviews.Content: The pool and spa were great! Breakfast was very good. The hotel was beautiful and the staff were very accomodating and warm. We had a wonderful time and will go back. The beds were very comfortable and everthing was clean and bright. Easy to get to and get back on the road.

Reviews.Title: “Impressive except for the breakfast”
Reviews.Author: internettie
Reviews.Content: New hotel, modern decor, huge rooms, great beds, good bathrooms, lots of good towels,excellent service. Has good size swimming pool and jacuzzi pool though we did not 'sample' them. Close to Starbucks and a few other restaurants, right off the freeway, close to my daughter's house which is why we chose the hotel. But would recommend this to anyone traveling to Indianapolis. As it is close to the freeway, easy to get downtown.Breakfast leaves something to be desired -- like much better coffee (but I have high standards and Starbucks is very close). Fresh fruit would have been good and plain or vanilla yogurt.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with large rooms”
Reviews.Author: Ispdet
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd stay at this hotel. We returned because of good experiences in the past. The only disappointment we experienced was the rudness of the other guests. We witnessed and overheard guest rudness with Hotel staff and with other hotel guests. We watched as several parents allowed their children trash the pool area and disrespect others. At one point the hotel staff needed to step in and ask them to leave. The staff conducted themselves in a very professional way, even when being spoken down to. We would return to this facility again.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Staff day? This hotel not high on my list!! Will avoid this in the Future!!”
Reviews.Author: AdrianDoug
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to slam this holel although the staff needs to be re-trained a bit on Customer Service and Repeat Business here are the things we experienced on our stay. Internet wireless problems made the functionality less then functional. Pool overchlorinated to a point that it made our skin sting. Breakfast buffet noticably had no meat (Bacon or Sasuage) and eggs were very undercooked Be sure to vacate any public areas as we were socializing in the breakfast area watching a live sports broadcast and were told to leave this area by 10pm on a Saturday and threatened to turn out the lights and TV in that area we were also told if we didn't leave that area by 10 we would be tossed out of the hotel!!

Reviews.Title: “Second stay and both were excellent!”
Reviews.Author: maggie4490
Reviews.Content: The managers and all other staff at this hotel were quality employees. It made my stay in Indianapolis very comfortable and enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Far above any other Holiday Inn or Holiday Inn Express”
Reviews.Author: scotty078
Reviews.Content: I regularly stay at HI Express when I travel and most of them are similar to each other, varying a little in style and offerings. This time, however, we were really surprised and delighted. It is fairly new and the owners have taken full advantage of that. The decor throughout the hotel was exceptional with colors, designs and art work far above that of any other. The room was fully equipped and spacious - it had ample room for the twin king sized beds! And they were available at the regular rate. The staff was pleasant and accommodating and even had a cold drink ready for us when we checked in. We will go out of our way to stay at this hotel in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service”
Reviews.Author: The2ndGrim
Reviews.Content: I spoke with Mr. Smrz about a very old, missing receipt that I need for my records. Others I'd spoken with the day before were unable to help. Not only was he able to find the receipt, he did so in less than 3 minutes and emailed it to me immediately. Best of all, I could hear his smile over the phone. This was great customer service, which is, unfortunately, pretty uncommon. Great Job!

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommend, clean, close to downtown/highway”
Reviews.Author: Kent_Stater
Reviews.Content: First of, I got a great price for this hotel on Hotwire & once it was booked, I checked here for reviews. I was a little wary with all the negative comments. But there's no turning back once you pay. That being said, I could not be more surprised when I walked into a very nicely decorated lobby. We were able to check in much earlier than its stated time, & there was no problem pulling up the reservation I made the night before. Still expecting the worst, our room hed 2 king sized beds, a flat screen TV, microwave & fridge, a rain showerhead & modern decor. The room was large & it was clean! My kids' feet weren't disgusting after running around w/o shoes & there were no gross mold or errant hairs in the bathroom. My only complaint was that the bed was too firm but I liked they had firm & soft pillows to choose from. We also enjoyed the indoor pool (yes it was cold until you got used to it) & the hot tub. The gym had several machines with towels, TV, & a water cooler. Every area needed a key card for access, & cameras were everywhere. The breakfast was a nice selection of scrambled eggs, sausage, cereals, breads, & yogurt, plus tea/coffee/juices. It wasn't gourmet or real health conscience, but much better than most free breakfasts. They offer 2 free drinks in the evenings during the week. Check out was breeze --since I prepaid, they slipped a blank invoice under my door & I just had to turn in the keys. All the staff was friendly & I was asked if my stay was satisfactory. I've checked my CC, & there have been no billing issues.

Reviews.Title: “Wow. HUGE super clean rooms. Love it!”
Reviews.Author: NativeGirl47
Reviews.Content: What a surprise. We booked a standard room with two beds. The staff was quiet but friendly. The room was super huge! My husband and I were traveling with our 17 yr old son. Got to the room to find two king beds with plenty of room to do aerobics all around lol. Room came with fridge and a microwave, different types of pillows (firm, soft). Room was spotless. This was a gem. Absolutely will stay here again. Great for families. So much room, very comfy!

Reviews.Title: “DON'T STAY HERE!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: mmmcirish
Reviews.Content: Not trust worthy people! Overcharged for a "no-show" room because they made a new reservation rather than use an existing reservation and won't do anything about the charge. I have to fight it & dispute it through my credit card company! Poor management and awful general management! I wouldn't recommend this to anyone, enemies or friends!! BEWARE! They only want money, not customer satisfaction!! BEWARE!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good choice for the money”
Reviews.Author: Dick-Karen
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were visiting Indianapolis for the NCAA Men's Basketball Final Four in April 2010. The hotel provided quick access to the highway into downtown. We could get to the stadium in a matter of 15 minutes. There were several fast food restaurants nearby but not much in the way of finer dining restaurants. The room and bathroom were clean and fresh (the hotel is only a couple of years old), the bed was comfortable with plenty of pillows, and the complimentary breakfast offered scrambled eggs and sausage in addition to the regular breakfast fare in a spacious pleasant room. There was a small but adequate fitness center, indoor pool and hot tub. We did not take advantage of these offerings but they seemed well maintained. The only feature that proved to be less than expected was the" internet access". There was one tiny room with one computer with service comparable to old dial up internet -- very slow and full of gliches. Don't plan on using their internet. Likewise, our T.V. reception was poor despite the new flat screen T.V. in the room. We found the hotel to be quite satisfactory compared to the price we would have paid to stay downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Not priority club member friendly”
Reviews.Author: InMarvin
Reviews.Content: As a platinum priority club member we usually enjoy late check outs. The lady at the front desk was very rude. Even shut our air conditioning off with the control swith located at the front desk. Beware!!! This was the only rude employee we met, but she is on a mission. Not priority club member friendly!!!

Reviews.Title: “We love this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: SilenceFamily
Reviews.Content: This Holiday Inn Express is welcoming from the moment your drive up to it, with its lovely blue spotlights. The lobby is bright and welcoming and leads to the beautiful breakfast room. We were there over Thanksgiving, so the breakfast room was decorated with a magnificant Christmas tree. The service for breakfast and the afternoon cocktail hour is fabulous! Our room was very, very, nice. We love the assortment of pillows, hard and soft. The large flatscreen TV was great and the lounge chair & computer chair are cozy and comfortable. We could live in that room! We also very much enjoyed the swimming pool with the "waterfall" and the hot tub. We had our grandchildren with us, so we swam everyday. The hotel is arranged very well so you don't have to walk through the lobby in your swimsuits. Everything in the hotel is in great condition and spotless! Even the stairwells were clean and attractively painted and carpeted, unlike most hotels which scrimp and leave stairways unpainted and uncleaned. The staff was amazing -- everyone went the extra mile to make our stay pleasant and as enjoyable as possible. Although the hotel is set up for business with WIFI and work stations in the rooms and a great business center, it is also very family friendly. We love this hotel - we were in Indianapolis visiting family - we'll definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: smb26smb
Reviews.Content: The breakfast was outstanding, 2 free drinks was nice. Restraunts available within the area. Upgraded our rooms for us since the hotel was full. Pool and hot tub area was very clean, with plenty of sitting area and towels. Didn't use the fitness area, but the room was kept clean, with towels and water available. Had a few arcade games and vending machines available. Free computer to use in the business center was nice to use since I didn't bring my laptop.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value for your dollar”
Reviews.Author: caljava
Reviews.Content: I always enjoy staying at this particular hotel, clean, comfortable, 2 kings, flat screen tv, delicious breakfast, very nice staffs, strategic location, quiet, and best value. I would recommend you to stay here or do your function.

Reviews.Title: “You can't beat the quality, cleanliness, and service.”
Reviews.Author: tenbucks
Reviews.Content: This is one of the newer model HEI's that have 2 king beds in every room. The value that a traveler gets for the buck here can't be beat. The hotel is new, very clean, the staff is very friendly, the location is 10 minutes from downtown. Gone are my days with the Hamptons, Hiltons, and Hilton garden Inns in this town.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and clean, quiet room.”
Reviews.Author: Illini4eva
Reviews.Content: Friendly, helpful staff and a roomy, quiet and clean room.

Reviews.Title: “luxurious accomodations were an unexpected plus”
Reviews.Author: greenwoodgardener
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at this hotel for 5 nights with a large group comprised of teens and adults. The accomodations were great. Very comfortable KING size beds (2) in each room. Lovely breakfast area with a very nice continental breakfast. Pool and exercise areas were very nice. Pool has a pretty waterfall feature. The staff was very friendly and service was great. I would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Beware!!!”
Reviews.Author: OhioMommy74
Reviews.Content: Our bathroom door would not shut, Carl at the front desk told us to try lifting it to close. The pool was so dirty you couldn't see you feet and stunk like urine. Hottub water was in same condition as pool and the heater did not work. Returned to room to watch movies and found that the cable was out. Carl advised he was aware it was out but couldn't do anything and failed to inform us when we checked in. We checked out and will never return. There are numerous hotels just down the road priced the same but up-kept much better.

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean hotel, friendly service, great location.”
Reviews.Author: tclaus
Reviews.Content: Hotel was close to the downtown area, easy to reach off the highway. Nice big rooms, clean, friendly staff, pricing not bad.

Reviews.Title: “Not the best of times...”
Reviews.Author: MickmeMan
Reviews.Content: The pool was rather small, it was so crowded we never even got a chance to use it. The breakfast foods were tasteless, at best. Mainly: Be prepared to have a little extra in your charge account - they add a $50 per day charge for "incidentals" and we never even charged anything to our room!! We received our bill with an extra $100 tacked on, I asked why, they explained (as I mentioned earlier), I responded that I didn't buy anything in the hotel and they said they always add the $50 per night, no matter if you buy anything (movies or whatever) or not, to cover "just in case". I explained that I was very upset about being charged for something I didn't buy, I was told that they always "refund" the money within 7 - 10 business days - gee thanks. I have never been charged in this way at any other hotel/motel.

Reviews.Title: “We were surprised how nice the hotel and the rooms were.”
Reviews.Author: IndianaWaterloo
Reviews.Content: It was a pleasure to stay somewhere that was as nice as our home. The large king size beds. The sheets and the bedding were very nice and comfortable. It was great having the extra pillows and not having to ask for them. The large flat screen TV was a great joy. Te breakfast was good, hot and the area clean. Finally hotels are starting to move with the time. Who would want to go stay somewhere and pay for it when the place isn't even as nice as your home. The large king beds and linens are VIP to people. The updated flat screen TVs make you want to come back. We are planning to book next year 2010 at this same hotel. Respectfully Nikki Graham Waterloo IN

Reviews.Title: “A very satisfaying deal to pay for this staying”
Reviews.Author: Franciscquito
Reviews.Content: A 4 weeks stay at Indianapolis for a consulting contract with Eli Lilly was my experience with Holiday Inn Express. Week 1&2 were at Holiday Inn Express at Down town area, but unfortunately the small swimming pool went into maintenance and the gym machines were not in good conditions, So I moved south to this new building Holiday Inn Express Beech Grove-Indianapolis Southeast, and surprise!, for the same rate 119.99 a got a roooomy doble king with studio, all as expected in a new construction building hotel. Staff very well trainied, breakfast more like a buffet style than a continental type, and best of all the swimming pool it's larger thant any other hotel os this brand I stayed before, you really can swim in it. I really recomend it, and there is a double points offer this fall after all!!, bisides I am a platinum member a get 50% extra points.

Reviews.Title: “An Awsome Value Right Down To The Vending Machines”
Reviews.Author: Sknovr
Reviews.Content: My wife and I attended a machine tool show about a block away from this motel and our reservations were made by the company hosting the show. We travel quite a lot for our business and we found this to be one of the best stays we have ever had. Each of the staff members we met were very friendly, outgoing and obviously well trained. It's refreshing to be made to feel as though you are welcome guests instead meeting the apathy we often find in motel staff. At check in we were told each guest gets two complimentary drinks each evening and while we didn't take advantage of this we noticed several people enjoying a beer and snacks as we made our way out to dinner. With fresh scrambled eggs and sausage the free breakfast was more like a breakfast buffet than the continental breakfast we expected. This is a new facility and has only been in operation for about 6 months so we expected everything to be new and fresh. What we didn't expect was the obvious attention to detail and the obvious extra effort for customer comfort. Our room was a "standard room" but it included free Wi-Fi, a plasma TV and two king-size beds instead of the usual queen-size or smaller beds. Even the ice machine/vending area shows the owner's attention to detail. Everything is enclosed in a room with a door so that it is soundproofed from the guests rooms. But what I found most interesting was that the soda machine offered both Coke and Pepsi products. A staff member told us the manager talked to nearly every distributor in Indianapolis before he found one willing to provide both. Overall I would say this is among the top 10 motels at which we have stayed. For this level of service we would expect to pay quite a bit more than the $94.00 our room cost.

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Express Beech Grove-Indianapolis Southeast
HotelInfo.Address: 5302 Victory Drive, Indianapolis, IN 46203
